title: Frontend Developer
description: Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

title: Backend Developer
description: Proficient in Node.js, Python, SQL, and REST API development.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Skilled in AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and Linux.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Strong in front-end and back-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB.

title: Database Administrator
description: Experienced with MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, database optimization, and backup strategies.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Looking for candidate proficient in Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, and UI/UX design.

title: Data Scientist
description: Required expertise in Python, pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and data analysis.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: 2+ years of experience in ML, TensorFlow, Keras, model deployment and data pipelines.

title: Product Manager
description: Strong communication and leadership skills, Agile/Scrum methodology, roadmap planning.

title: IT Support Engineer
description: Knowledge of Windows, Linux, networking, hardware troubleshooting, and customer support.
